# Alberta Hiking Resources

> Find your way in the jungle of FB and Meetup groups. Hiking Partners. Information. Ideas.

## Documentation Sets

- [Alberta Hiking Resources](https://www.alberta-hiking-resources.org/llms-full.txt): Find your way in the jungle of FB and Meetup groups. Hiking Partners. Information. Ideas.

## Getting Started

- [Introduction](https://www.alberta-hiking-resources.org/raw/getting-started.md): Welcome to Alberta Hiking Resources.
- [Contribute](https://www.alberta-hiking-resources.org/raw/getting-started/contributing.md): Contribute to this site

## Meetup Groups

- [Introduction](https://www.alberta-hiking-resources.org/raw/meetup-groups.md): A few solid options to find your hiking fam.
- [Facebook Meetups](https://www.alberta-hiking-resources.org/raw/meetup-groups/facebook.md): A few solid options to find your hiking fam.
- [Meetup.com](https://www.alberta-hiking-resources.org/raw/meetup-groups/meetup.com.md): Formal hiking groups on Meetup.com.
- [Alpine Club of Canada](https://www.alberta-hiking-resources.org/raw/meetup-groups/acc.md): Events organized by the Alpine Club of Canada.
- [Guided Trips](https://www.alberta-hiking-resources.org/raw/meetup-groups/guided-trips.md): Excursions organized by professional guides.
- [Alberta Hikers & Climbers](https://www.alberta-hiking-resources.org/raw/meetup-groups/alberta-hikers-and-climbers.md): Alberta Hikers & Climbers's group info.
- [Alberta Hikers Together](https://www.alberta-hiking-resources.org/raw/meetup-groups/alberta-hikers-together.md): Alberta Hikers Together group info.
- [Find Hiking Groups/Partners, Alberta](https://www.alberta-hiking-resources.org/raw/meetup-groups/find-hiking-groups-partners-alberta.md): Find Hiking Groups/Partners, Alberta group info.

## Hiking & Scrambling Beta

- [Introduction](https://www.alberta-hiking-resources.org/raw/hiking-scrambling-beta.md): Get inspired and start planning your next adventure.
- [Guidebooks](https://www.alberta-hiking-resources.org/raw/hiking-scrambling-beta/guidebooks.md): Hiking and Scrambling guidebooks
- [Trip Reports](https://www.alberta-hiking-resources.org/raw/hiking-scrambling-beta/trip-reports.md): Trip Reports, Blogs, and GPS Traces.
- [Inspirational Groups](https://www.alberta-hiking-resources.org/raw/hiking-scrambling-beta/groups.md): Inspirational Groups (Pictures and Ideas).
- [Applications](https://www.alberta-hiking-resources.org/raw/hiking-scrambling-beta/apps.md): Applications (Maps, etc)
- [Camping & Huts](https://www.alberta-hiking-resources.org/raw/hiking-scrambling-beta/camping-huts.md): Want to sleep close to the trailhead?

## Weather & Trail Conditions

- [Introduction](https://www.alberta-hiking-resources.org/raw/weather-trail-conditions.md): Don't get caught off guard! Use these to check what Mother Nature's cooking.
- [Weather & Webcams](https://www.alberta-hiking-resources.org/raw/weather-trail-conditions/weather-webcams.md): Sun? Rain? Snow? ðŸ¤·
- [Fires & Smoke](https://www.alberta-hiking-resources.org/raw/weather-trail-conditions/fires-smoke.md): Keep your lungs healthy and avoid a $25,000 ticket.
- [Trail Conditions & Trip Reports](https://www.alberta-hiking-resources.org/raw/weather-trail-conditions/trail-conditions.md): Your go-to spots for updates on trail conditions and closures.

## Outdoor Gear

- [Introduction](https://www.alberta-hiking-resources.org/raw/outdoor-gear.md): Because having the right gear makes the hike way more fun (and less cold/soggy).

## Hike Organizers

- [Introduction](https://www.alberta-hiking-resources.org/raw/hike-organizers.md): Welcome to Alberta Hiking Resources.
- [Sami](https://www.alberta-hiking-resources.org/raw/hike-organizers/sami.md): Sami's trail and camping philosophy.

## Frequently Asked Questions

- [F.A.Q.](https://www.alberta-hiking-resources.org/raw/faq.md): Frequently Asked Questions
